p: A silicon wafer serving as mould for the PDMS chip casting was fabricated under cleanroom conditions at the Helmholtz Nano Facility (HNF) [ 23]. Prior to the following thin film processing procedure, chromium-glass dark-field lithography photomasks were fabricated by HNF staff.
